name: GooBoom
summary: The ultimate one touch real-time multiplayer falling goo puzzle game.
storyline:
Test your friends, family and random players worldwide to see who has the ultimate reflexes by combining intelligence, speed and stamina to see who will be the victor and who will accept defeat.   
With 11 playable characters to unlock and more to come, GooBoom is the ultimate challenger for you and those you invite, to play against you.  
Discover what over 1,000,000 people already love!  
  
POWER UPS  
There are 20 different Power Ups, which are divided into categories under Buffs and Nerfs.   
Buffs are designed to assist in your success.   
Nerfs are designed to assist in your opponent's demise.   
  
CHALLENGES  
Everyday there is a new Daily Challenge for you to complete!  
5 stages with progressively harder challenges!  
  
REAL-TIME GAMEPLAY  
*Versus - Multiplayer  
*Campaign - Single player gameplay    
  
YOU HAVE THE RIGHT TO BRAG  
Brag to Facebook when you are victorious!
